mapper.insert: insert into T_OAM_CABLE_CONTRACT (ID, NAME, COMPANY_ID, PAY_TYPE,contract_status,contract_start_time,contract_end_time,crt_time,operate_username,path) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{contractStatus}, #{contractStartTime}, #{contractEndTime},#{crtTime},#{operateUername},#{path})
mapper.update: update T_OAM_CABLE_CONTRACT set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, contract_status = #{contractStatus}, contract_start_time = #{contractStartTime}, contract_end_time = #{contractEndTime}, crt_time = #{crtTime}, operate_username = #{operateUsername}, path = #{path} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
